name: Joe's Trippy Adventure game & Jades Safari Adventure Game
name_original: Joe's Trippy Adventure game & Jades Safari Adventure Game
description:
My two games that are in progress there are also web versions I'm making which I will publish when i figure how to do to it with the erb files I have

Joe's trippy game is a magical adventure you and your good buddy Dave embark on.

Jades Safari adventure is a game im making for my 9 year old niece Jade this is the first game I started still in progress ive been doing most of my work on stuff for class and my trippy game

My github link where you can check out the code if you are in to that

https://github.com/joestrippygame
